title: Car-City Application
rundown: Provide Cars with online support, and users can buy cars and give a review Implemented User Authentication, Admin System, CURD Operation. The Prerogative for Admin to add more cars, Delete cars, Manage Orders and make another Admin.
miniDetail: Provide Cars with online support, and users can buy cars and give a review, also manage Orders.
tools: HTML , CSS, React.js , Node.js ,Express Js ,MongoDB, Firebase.

title: Medi-Sheba Application
rundown: Provide Medicine service. Purchasers can take any kind of services that the website provides.Possibility for the user to create an account, Make Orders, FAQ section. Involved Private Router, Redirect page after login or registration.
miniDetail: Provide Medicine service. Purchasers can take any kind of services that the website provides.

title: Courier-Sheba Application
rundown: Presuming Courier service. Users can take any service that the website provides.Constructed CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) features using Node.js and Responsive Design. Option for the user to create an account, make orders, manage orders.
miniDetail: Presuming Courier service. Users can take any service that the website provides.
tools: HTML , CSS, React.js , React-Bootstrap, Node.js ,Express Js ,MongoDB, Firebase.
